text: Göttingen is a district in Lower Saxony, Germany. The western half of the district is covered by the Weserbergland mountains. ==Towns and municipalities== Towns Samtgemeinden Samtgemeinden Samtgemeinden #Bad Grund #Bad Lauterberg #Bad Sachsa #Duderstadt #Göttingen #Hann.
